verses.t: O give thanks{H3034} Lordunto the {H3068}; for he is good{H2896}: because his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
Let Israel{H3478} now say{H559}, that his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
Let the house{H1004} of Aaron{H175} now say{H559}, that his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
Let them now that fear{H3373} Lordthe {H3068} say{H559}, that his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
I called{H7121} Lordupon the {H3050} in distress{H4712}: Lordthe {H3050} answered{H6030} me, and set me in a large place{H4800}.in distress: Heb. out of distress
LordThe {H3068} is on my side; I will not fear{H3372}: what can{H6213} man{H120} do{H6213} unto me?on…: Heb. for me
LordThe {H3068} taketh my part with them that help{H5826} me: therefore shall I see{H7200} my desire upon them that hate{H8130} me.
It is better{H2896} to trust{H2620} Lordin the {H3068} than to put confidence{H982} in man{H120}.
It is better{H2896} to trust{H2620} Lordin the {H3068} than to put confidence{H982} in princes{H5081}.
All nations{H1471} compassed me about{H5437}: but in the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068} will I destroy{H4135} them.destroy…: Heb. cut them off
They compassed me about{H5437}; yea, they compassed me about{H5437}: but in the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068} I will destroy{H4135} them.
They compassed me about{H5437} like bees{H1682}; they are quenched{H1846} as the fire{H784} of thorns{H6975}for in the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068} I will destroy{H4135} them.destroy: Heb. cut down
Thou hast thrust{H1760} sore{H1760} at me that I might fall{H5307}: Lordbut the {H3068} helped{H5826} me.
LordThe {H3050} is my strength{H5797} and song{H2176}, and is become my salvation{H3444}.
The voice{H6963} of rejoicing{H7440} and salvation{H3444} is in the tabernacles{H168} of the righteous{H6662}: the right hand{H3225} Lordof the {H3068} doeth{H6213} valiantly{H2428}.
The right hand{H3225} Lordof the {H3068} is exalted{H7426}: the right hand{H3225} Lordof the {H3068} doeth{H6213} valiantly{H2428}.
I shall not die{H4191}, but live{H2421}, and declare{H5608} the works{H4639} Lordof the {H3050}.
LordThe {H3050} hath chastened{H3256} me sore{H3256}: but he hath not given me over{H5414} unto death{H4194}.
Open{H6605} to me the gates{H8179} of righteousness{H6664}: I will go{H935} into them, and I will praise{H3034} Lordthe {H3050}:
This gate{H8179} Lordof the {H3068}, into which the righteous{H6662} shall enter{H935}.
I will praise{H3034} thee: for thou hast heard{H6030} me, and art become my salvation{H3444}.
The stone{H68} which the builders{H1129} refused{H3988} is become the head{H7218} stone of the corner{H6438}.
Lord'sThis is the {H3068} doing; it is marvellous{H6381} in our eyes{H5869}.the Lord's…: Heb. from the Lord
This is the day{H3117} which Lordthe {H3068} hath made{H6213}; we will rejoice{H1523} and be glad{H8055} in it.
Save{H3467} now, I beseech{H577} Lordthee, O {H3068}: LordO {H3068}, I beseech{H577} thee, send now prosperity{H6743}.
Blessed{H1288} be he that cometh{H935} in the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}: we have blessed{H1288} you out of the house{H1004} Lordof the {H3068}.
God{H410} is Lordthe {H3068}, which hath shewed us light{H215}: bind{H631} the sacrifice{H2282} with cords{H5688}, even unto the horns{H7161} of the altar{H4196}.
Thou art my God{H410}, and I will praise{H3034} thee: thou art my God{H430}, I will exalt{H7311} thee.
O give thanks{H3034} Lordunto the {H3068}; for he is good{H2896}: for his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
